fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Business and Industry, Single market, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
Groupe d'experts de la Commission sur l'entrepreneuriat social (GECES).  
 
[the form requires a minimum of 10 words, so here are some extra words]
relevant_communication: EngagedX has previously been appointed by the European Commission's Joint Research Centre, Institute for Prospective Technological Studies (JRC-IPTS), in collaboration with DG Employment, Social Affairs and Inclusion (DG EMPL), to undertake a ‘Review of the state of play of practice and theory of assessing social investment with regard to ICT-enabled social innovation in integrated approaches to social services’. It includes supporting the development of an outline operational framework to assess the impacts generated by ICT-enabled social innovation initiatives that promote social investment.
goals__remit:
We are specialist consultants for social impact investing. 
 
EngagedX is the leader in performance data for social impact investing. 
 
We help you understand and compare the societal impacts and financial performance of your investments – by providing: 
 
Consultancy services 
 
Thought leadership 
 
Product development 
 
Our mission is to enable more mainstream capital to be deployed in a way that intentionally seeks positive outcomes for all and actively measures its impact on society.
